name: GKGameSessionEventListener
desc: An event listener that handles game session events.

items.name: func session(GKGameSession, didAdd: GKCloudPlayer)
items.desc: Tells the listener a new player has been added to a game session.

items.name: func session(GKGameSession, didRemove: GKCloudPlayer)
items.desc: Tells the listener a player left a game session.

items.name: func session(GKGameSession, player: GKCloudPlayer, didChange: GKConnectionState)
items.desc: Tells the listener a player's connection state has changed.

items.name: enum GKConnectionState
items.desc: Possible connection states for a player

items.name: func session(GKGameSession, didReceive: Data, from: GKCloudPlayer)
items.desc: Tells the listener the player received data from another player.

items.name: func session(GKGameSession, didReceiveMessage: String, with: Data, from: GKCloudPlayer)
items.desc: Tells the listener a player has received a message from another player.

items.name: func session(GKGameSession, player: GKCloudPlayer, didSave: Data)
items.desc: Tells the listener data was saved by a player.
